review: Best tom clancy game. Good graphic, a lot of weapon and characters. The game is a combination between csgo (tactical and game mode), dota 2 ( abilities ), TF2 ( class or maybe call Operator). But the problem is the loading system is too long, a lot of glitches. And the funny thing is why all the operators can't jump ?
